PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-04862011-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActFirearms Act
SubjectOrder Amending the United States Enforcement Officers Exemption Order (Transportation of Firearms)
PrecisOrder Amending the UNITED STATES ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS EXEMPTION ORDER (Transportation of Firearms), in order to allow United States enforcement officers to travel through Canada with their firearms to access or return from a work assignment in the United States. The Order will replace the Exemption Order currently in force which is scheduled to expire on April 1, 2011, for an additional five-year period.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending the United States Enforcement Officers Exemption Order (Transportation of Firearms)
precis: Order Amending the UNITED STATES ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS EXEMPTION ORDER (Transportation of Firearms), in order to allow United States enforcement officers to travel through Canada with their firearms to access or return from a work assignment in the United States.  The Order will replace the Exemption Order currently in force which is scheduled to expire on April 1, 2011, for an additional five-year period.
